> ::Zardus/Havoc/Repressor/Bloodystrike/Reptilica::
>
> Zardus frowns, looking at the Mafia firing. He aims at Grenade,
> firing 20 rapid shots at him.

Grenade, who was still hovering, was hit by the twenty shots, and decends to
the ground with a growl, landing and slowly moving his blaster. Grenade
slowed down under damage, unlike his comrades. He fired at Zardus, 3 slow
moving and powerful blasts.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Repressor jumps into the air, the shots passing under him, a few
> hitting his legs.
>
> Transforming into a helecopter and flying forward, rear boosters
> speeding him along as he fires two missiles, one heading for Gigas,
> the other for Horn Drill.

Horn Drill dodges the missile, the explosion damaging his side. He fires up
at Repressor with agression, 4 shots. Gigas was struck on the arm with the
missile, his arm becoming immobile. The slow moving bot fires a missile up
at Repressor with his other arm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Havoc gains altitude again, diving yet another time and dropping a
> bomb, this one heading at Beholder, mini-boosters proppeling it at
> him.

Beholder throws a charge at the bomb, but it sticks to the bomb and the bomb
rolls down to Beholder's feet with the charge on it. It explodes as Beholder
tries to shield himself, blasting Beholder to the ground and the propulsion
knocking him into a tree as he rolled.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
